title: Help needed for using udp server
body: Hey nice work i tested your udp server to send imu data from multiwii to my pc using rpi also tried the other way by sending RC commands and it works great but i need some help developing a python script that can receive imu data from rpi and send RC commands from my pc parallely. Also a script in rpi side that sends imu data and receives rc data to control the flight controller... is this possible...Also i want to know why you used twisted internet...can udp server be implemented just by using socket and threading modules? I dont know about twisted internet module as it is hard to find tutorials on it...

title: formation flight
body:
for formation flight (maybe 3 drones or more) we need to identify the number of drone before send MSP data,

btw, any idea how send MSP data to right drone?

title: Positon print integer
body: for the pid thread, the printed position value is integer rather that a float.

title: pitch and roll problem
body: When flying, position control is not working and makes the vehicle fly away very fast to another position... roll and pitch might be inverted...

title: desiredRoll & pitch are not global...
body: updateCommand is stopping because the PID calculated roll and pitch are not global.
